Changelog
=========


1.1.0 (2019-08-08)
------------------

- Allow multiple notified email addresses per site.
  The string in the config file is a list of strings now. [busykoala]


1.0.1 (2019-08-05)
------------------

- Fix version conflict in test packages. [busykoala]


1.0.0 (2019-08-02)
------------------

- Initial implementation.
